The Celestial word for "repent" is etched in golden lettering on the shaft of this +2 greater striking merciful mithral warhammer. An evil-aligned creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Enfeebled]{Enfeebled 2} when carrying or wielding this weapon.

Activate 2 command, Interact

Frequency once per hour

Effect You hold your weapon aloft, calling on righteousness to steel your resolve. You cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Protection] on yourself and you must select evil as the chosen alignment.

Redeemer Wielder If you're a champion of the redeemer cause, you also gain the following two benefits.

  • When you critically hit an evil creature with the blessed reformer, until the end of your next turn, the target takes a â€“10-foot penalty to its Speeds and can't Step.
  • You can Activate the weapon in the following way.

Activate 1 command, Interact

Frequency once per day

Requirements You hit a creature using the blessed reformer as your last action

Effect You cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Calm] at the same level as your champion focus spells. It must target the creature you hit, and the creature takes a status penalty on its save against the spell equal to the blessed reformer's number of weapon damage dice.

Craft Requirements You're a champion with the redeemer cause. The initial materials must include 140 gp of mithral.
